description:
The preliminaries for the third exam are one on one combat, and the first match is between Sasuke and Orochimaru`s minion Yoroi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bushy Brow`s Jealousy: Lions Barrage Unleashed!
Le Shishirendan ! La fureur du lion
Sasuke Uchiha gegen Yoroi Akado – Das Duell
กำเนิดสิงห์ระเบิดเตะ
ゲジまゆジェラシー!『獅子連弾』誕生!
